Button A: X+94, Y+34
Button B: X+22, Y+67
Prize: X=10000000008400, Y=10000000005400

(R_X - (A*X_A))/X_B = b 


RX = a* X_A + b * X_B


RY = a* Y_A + b * Y_B
RY-a*Y_A = b*Y_B
RY/Y_B-a*Y_A/Y_B = b

RX = a*X_A + (RY/Y_B-a*Y_A/Y_B)*X_B

RX = a*X_A + X_B*RY/Y_B-(a*Y_A*X_B/Y_B)

RX - X_B*RY/Y_B = a*X_A - a *(Y_A*X_B/Y_B)



10000000008400 = a*94 + (10000000005400/67-a(34/67))*22
10000000008400 = a*94 + 22*10000000005400/67-a(34*22/67)

10000000008400- 22*10000000005400/67 = a*94 - a*(34*22/67)

6716417917074.627 = 94*a - 11.164179104477611*a
6716417917074.627 = 82.83582089552239*a

81081081161.08109 = a

81081081161.08109 * 94
10000000008400 -7621621629141.622 = 2378378379258.378

2378378379258.378/22

108108108148.1081 = b


7243243245923.242 + 2756756759476.757
